mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.body, b.inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY b.id DESC
SELECT id, title, body, inserted FROM Board WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board(title, body, inserted) VALUES(#{title}, #{body}, #{inserted})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title = #{title}, body = #{body} WHERE id = #{id}
